= $this$ =

To export the ontology or open it in external tools (such as Protege for editing) use this link:

{{#widget: com.fluidops.iwb.widget.system.ExportOntologyWidget
| label = 'Export Ontology'
| ontologyURI = $this$
}}

== Classes  ==

<div style="width:650px; padding-top:10px; padding-bottom:10px">
{{ #widget: TableResult
| query = 'SELECT ?class WHERE { GRAPH ?g { ?class rdf:type owl:Class . ?? rdf:type owl:Ontology } }'
}}
</div>

== Individuals  ==

<div style="width:650px; padding-top:10px; padding-bottom:10px">
{{ #widget: TableResult
